name: Don't Fall (itch) (NorielSylvire)
description:
This is a platformer game where you can control the direction of gravity. Avoid deadly traps, collect all the froots and reach the goal with the highest score!

  • A and D: go left and right.
  • W: Make the gravity point up.
  • S: Make the gravity point down.
  • Space: jump.
  • Checkpoints
  • Traps and interactable objects
  • Controlling the direction of gravity!
